item.description: Come join us as we celebrate the autumn season. Events will include an acorn eating workshop, herb bundling, pumpkin carving, jam/ honey tasting and seed exchange. There will be live acoustic music and an open mic for all interested. Please bring some food or drink or jam/honey to share! This is a pot-lucky event. We will also have a cider press for apple pressing! Please join us and share in the abundance of food, music, and community!
item.name: Community Orchard Harvest Festival!
